meaningMnemonic:
This is a combination of the words 規則 and 正しい, that you learned already. If you follow the rules in the correct order, everything will stay <vocabulary>regular</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>orderly</vocabulary>.

This word means that something follows a regular pattern or schedule. It’s commonly used to describe disciplined lifestyles, such as with regular sleep, exercise, and healthy eating habits, and implies that the regularity is desirable.
readingMnemonic: This is a combination of the words 規則 and 正しい, which you learned already, so you should be able to read this word too.
